data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Zhen, He, Jun-Hua, Chen, Xue-Xin (2016): The genus Pholetesor Mason, 1981 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae) from China, with descriptions of eleven new species. Zootaxa 4150 (4): 351-387, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4150.4.1|98 occurrences
